title: Jonathan Kodjia - Player profile | Transfermarkt
snippet: Jonathan Kodjia is a 36-year old football player aus Cote d'Ivoire, (* 22/10/1989 in Saint-Denis, France). Kodjia is 01/07/2025 without a club since. He plays in the position Centre-Forward. His market value is €75k.
